application_details: motions filed by various parties seeking intervention or party status
decision_made: Bristol-Myers granted full party status; other motions dismissed with costs
procedure_followed: under Rule 109 of Federal Court Rules, 1998
cause_of_action: dispute over Apotex's application for drug approval and Minister's refusal based on regulatory non-compliance
result_details: Bristol-Myers can fully participate. Motions by other innovator companies and Rx&D to intervene are dismissed.
